attributes.action: award those personnel whos served on RMS St Helena and Naval party 2100 the Falklands Campeign medal that they deserved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to beurocratic rules thase that served on RMS St Helena and naval party 2100 did not get Falklands Campeign medals. although they were in the falklands for several months the missed out on the 28 consecutive days rule by 1 day.
